title: Charming England City Stay in Picturesque York
description: Quaint and homely, Holiday Inn Express York, an IHG Hotel, offers a calming retreat for all in the mediaeval, walled city of York, a place known for its ability to transport travellers back in time. A hearty, traditional English breakfast at the onsite Express Café will fuel you up for a day of exploring, while a stronger drop at the hotel’s cosy lounge bar is the perfect way to wind down before a restful night’s sleep.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express York, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Malton Road, North Yorkshire, York, YO32 9TE, England, United Kingdom

title: York City Break in the History-Filled Neighbourhood of Walmgate
description: Immerse yourself in medieval history with a stay at Hotel Indigo York, an IHG Hotel, tucked away on one of the city's oldest streets in the cosy neighbourhood of Walmgate. Get a taste of the town's confectionary heritage with a foodie exploration of the nearby shops and boutiques before retreating to your cocoa-coloured hotel. Between adventures, make a pit stop at the onsite No.88 bar for a craft beer, sweet cocktail, Yorkshire tea, or mouthwatering pizza.
location_description: Hotel Indigo York, an IHG Hotel

title: Vibrant York Central Stay with Lobby Bar & Restaurant
description: Comfortable, warm and welcoming, Holiday Inn York City Centre, an IHG Hotel has everything you need for a relaxing stay. A stone’s throw from one of Britain’s most picturesque streets, The Shambles, and many of the city's other historical attractions, the hotel is the perfect base for travellers looking to immerse themselves in the beauty of Yorkshire. Begin the day's adventures with a hot buffet breakfast, and cap off each night with a  drink in the cosy lobby bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn York City Centre, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Edwardian York Escape with Onsite Dining & Pool
description: Enjoy a royal stay at The Grand York, formerly the Edwardian headquarters of the wealthy North Eastern Railway Company. Incredible facilities at this five-star hotel include an award-winning cookery school, traditional afternoon tea at the Rise Restaurant and the 1906 Bar (be sure to order a cocktail while you're here). Better yet, the hotel's central location means it is only a short amble to the main shopping streets and the Medieval tower walls.

title: Charming Heritage Escape in the Heart of York
description:
You'll be immediately enchanted by the English charms of No.1, York within moments of arrival. Housed within a Grade II Listed Regency townhouse of regal proportions, the stunning hotel features dreamy windows, sky-high ceilings and a central sweeping staircase. The exterior is draped in winding ivy and the light from the twinkling lanterns inside and beams outside, adding to the allure and magical atmosphere. Retreat to the hotel bar each day to toast your explorations at The Rhubard Bar, feast on flavour at the Pearly Cow or head to the onsite spa for bespoke treatments.

When you're ready to explore, this quaint and historic townhouse is perched just minutes from York Minster in Bootham - a vibrant and stylish shopping and entertainment district. It’s also perfectly placed for a day trip to the stunning Yorkshire Dales National Park and other nearby historical sites.
offer_address: 1 Clifton, York, North Yorkshire YO30 6AA, United Kingdom
